field.name: summary
field.value: Error on generation with Lazy and INotifyPropertyChanged

field.name: description
field.value:
I've created an ActiveWriter diagram with Implement INotifyPropertyChanged set to true, and Use Virtual Properties also set to true. Then, i've created an entity with Lazy = true.
All the properties and methods were created as virtual, but the INotifyPropertyChanged event wasn't, so i get a NHibernate exception saying that the entity can't be a proxy.

comment.author: patearl
comment.text: This now works with C#. At the time of the fix, VB didn't allow virtual events.
